title: The impact of nano-polystyrene on human serum albuminâ€“paracetamol interactions: understanding the impact on therapeutic development and safety
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,1012-1022
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00599B, Paper
Zachariah Sunil, John Thomas, Murugesh Shivashankar, Natarajan Chandrasekaran
Paracetamol/Acetaminophen has two binding sites on HSA. NPS has a stronger binding affinity to HSA compared to that of paracetamol. The NPS-HSA interaction causes an alteration in the secondary structure of HSA, resulting in decrease in the binding affinity of paracetamol to HSA.
